column4: hi i have a problem where i had to re-install ubuntu and when i did i can't boot into windows anymore, it says starting up when i select xp but it hangs there the os is still in tact and all files are there
has anyone else had this problem when re-installing linux onto a dual boot pc?
I re-installed linux on a dual-boot pc no problem, but I reformatteed the partition first and my other OS was on another physical drive
well actually I deleted and re-created the partition
what's the problem
